Key Match Events: Harmeet Singh struck three consecutive sixes to turn the tide in favor of the USA.
Harmeet Singh finished unbeaten on 33 off 13 balls.
Corey Anderson remained not out on 34.
Towhid Hridoy top-scored for Bangladesh with 58 runs.
USA won by 5 wickets with 3 balls remaining.
Miscellaneous Highlights: USA, ranked 19th in T20Is, defeated Bangladesh, ranked 9th.
This was USA's second win against a Full Member in T20Is, following their victory against Ireland in 2021.
